name: Chapter 15: A New Beginning
short_description: Sarah is presented with an opportunity to return to her world or stay and continue her work in the magical society. She makes her choice and sets the stage for the future.
people: Sarah Davis, her allies, council members
from_prev_chapter: Sarah reflects on her journey and prepares for change.

beats.long_title: The Summoning of Sarah to the Council Chambers
beats.description: Sarah is summoned by her allies to appear before the council in a special assembly at the academy grounds. She senses something significant is about to happen.

beats.long_title: The Council Presents an Unexpected Proposal
beats.description: To her surprise, the council members offer Sarah a chance to return to her own world or stay and continue influencing the magical society. They explain the implications of both choices thoroughly.
Before making her decision, Sarah has flashbacks to her experiences, friendships, and challenges in the magical world. These memories help her weigh her options more clearly.
Sarah seeks counsel from her closest friends and allies, discussing the pros and cons of each choice. They provide heartfelt advice and support her regardless of her decision.

beats.long_title: Sarah's Moment of Solitude and Reflection
beats.description: Taking time alone, Sarah walks through the academy grounds and reflects on her life in the magical world. She contemplates what returning to her own world would mean for her and for those she leaves behind.

beats.long_title: Sarah Announces Her Decision to the Council
beats.description: After much reflection, Sarah returns to the council chamber and announces her decision. The room is filled with anticipation and curiosity.

beats.long_title: Getting Ready for the Next Chapter
beats.description: Depending on her choice, Sarah begins to make preparations for her transition—either packing her belongings to return home or planning her next steps in the magical world.
If she chooses to return to her world, Sarah says emotional goodbyes to her friends and mentors. Many express their gratitude and share how much she has impacted their lives.

beats.long_title: Sarah Strengthens Her Commitment to the Magical World
beats.description: If she decides to stay, Sarah reaffirms her commitment to her work and to her friends, setting new goals for the future. The council expresses their support and excitement for what’s to come.

beats.long_title: Sarah Steps Through the Portal to Her Chosen Future
beats.description: Sarah steps through a magical portal that will either take her back to her own world or symbolize her new beginning in the magical society. This marks the start of a new chapter in her life.
